sentences.en: After abandoning his devastated home on the outskirts of Damascus, Mustafa, his wife, children and aging parents spent months seeking safety in one town after another.
sentences.cn: 在抛弃大马士革郊区破坏殆尽的家后，穆斯塔法和他的妻子，孩子几年迈的父母花了几个月的时间在一个又一个小镇躲避战祸。

sentences.en: As they approached the outskirts of the city, Ella's mood visibly lightened.
sentences.cn: 他们快到市郊时，埃拉的情绪明显好转。

sentences.en: Before the train had left the outskirts of London he behaved true to form and began a conversation.
sentences.cn: 一如往常，列车还没驶出伦敦郊区，他就开始和别人聊起天来。

sentences.en: From Wrexham centre take the Chester Road to the outskirts of town.
sentences.cn: 从雷克瑟姆市中心出发，沿着切斯特路到达市郊。

sentences.en: Hours later we reached the outskirts of New York.
sentences.cn: 我们几小时后到达了纽约市郊。

sentences.en: Kate's house was on the western outskirts of the town.
sentences.cn: 凯特的家在该城的西郊.

sentences.en: On the extreme northwestern outskirts of the city stands the Buddhist temple.
sentences.cn: 那所佛教寺院位于市郊的最西北角.

sentences.en: On the outskirts of every city I saw, there was a veritable forest of apartment blocks under construction.
sentences.cn: 在我造访的每个城市的郊区，一栋栋在建公寓楼确实是鳞次栉比。

sentences.en: Our car broke down on the outskirts of the city.
sentences.cn: 我们的汽车在市郊出了故障.

sentences.en: Our forward troops teached the outskirts of the city on May 30.
sentences.cn: 我先头部队已于5月30日抵达该城近郊.

sentences.en: She found a small, inexpensive motel on the outskirts of the town; it was barren and unlovely.
sentences.cn: 她在城郊找了一家便宜的小汽车旅馆，那旅馆既简陋又难看。

sentences.en: The rubble was then dumped in a municipal landfill site on the outskirts of Florence.
sentences.cn: 这堆碎石后来被倾倒在佛罗伦萨市郊的一处垃圾填埋场。

sentences.en: The scenic spot is on northwestern outskirts of Beijing.
sentences.cn: 这个风景区位于北京的西北远郊.

sentences.en: The troops drove near the outskirts of the town.
They live on the outskirts ( ie in an outlying district ) of Paris.
sentences.cn: 他们住在巴黎 市郊.

sentences.en: They live on the outskirts of Milan.
They mostly live on the outskirts of a town.
We bivouacked on the outskirts of the city.
Why not escape city noises and enter the peace of outskirts with our weekend trip?
sentences.cn: 为什么不参加我们的周末旅行，走出城市的喧闹，步入郊外的宁静呢？

trans.tran_cn: 郊外，市郊，郊区，从外围经过，边缘
trans.tran_en: the parts of a town or city that are furthest from the centre
